ModMetaData.name: CPS
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description:
CPS
Cabin: + soundproof
TSS: + has built-in nutrient paste producer for feeding occupants + optionally connects to VNPE network (as a consumer) + optionally connects to VRES hemogen network (as a consumer and producer) + optionally connects to DBH for water and bladder needs + maintains comfortable inside temperature
[url=https://ko-fi.com/K3K81Z3W5][img]https://i.imgur.com/Utx6OIH.png[/img][/url] [url=https://github.com/zed-0xff/RW-CPS]github[/url]
